item.title: Frost & Sullivan anticipates a need for independent analyses to support IPOs
item.description: A research and consulting firm, Frost & Sullivan, predicts significant growth for the Australian Stock Exchange (ASX) in 2017, with nearly 45 companies already lined up for initial public offerings (IPOs). This positive outlook comes after the ASX saw a stable number of IPOs in 2016, similar to the previous year. Notably, technology and fintech companies made up about 25% of these listings. Frost & Sullivan played a key role in several 2016 ASX IPOs by providing independent market reports (IMRs).
